links: Moshe Levin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: s = First[RealDigits[N[Pi, 1000]]]; aa = {}; Do[If[OddQ[s[[n]]], AppendTo[aa, 1], AppendTo[aa, 0]], {n, 1, Length[s]}]; aa (* _Artur Jasinski_, Mar 05 2010 *)s= RealDigits[N[Pi, 10000]][[1]];Table[{n,Mod[s[[n]],2]},{n,10000}](* this gives b-file *)(* _Moshe Levin_, Oct 05 2011*)
author: _Maghraoui Abdelkader_
